`r yr <- YEAR`
# Models directory for `r yr`

This directory contains all the models run for the **`r yr`** stock assessment.

```{r paste("dirs-", yr), echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = "asis"}
library(purrr)
library(tibble)
library(data.tree)
library(plyr)

drs <- list.dirs(recursive = FALSE)
drs_nice <- gsub("\\.\\/", "", drs)

walk2(drs, drs_nice, ~{
  x <- file.path(.x, "this-version.html")
  cat(paste0("[Click to enter **", .y, "** directory]("), x, ")\n\n")
})
```

```{r paste("tree-dirs-", yr), echo = FALSE}
path <- list.dirs(here::here("models", yr), recursive = TRUE, full.names = FALSE)
path <- path[path != ""]
# Extract unique root dirs
root_inds <- grep("^[-a-zA-Z0-9_]+$", path)
if(!length(root_inds)){
  vecs <- NULL
}else if(length(root_inds) == 1){
  # There's only one subdirectory
  vecs <- list(path)
}else{
  vecs <- split_at(path, root_inds)
}

# Create a list element for each root dir
lst <- map(vecs, ~{
  df <- map(strsplit(.x, "/"), ~{
    as_tibble(t(.x)) |> 
      rbind.fill()
  }) |> 
    map_df(~{.x})
  df$pathString <- apply(df, 1, function(x) paste(trimws(na.omit(x)), collapse = "/"))
  as.Node(df)
}) |> 
  setNames(path[root_inds])

# Print them out
map(lst, ~{
  .x  
})
```
